free: #e Kui is very sick for a long time.
#e Kui is very sick for a long time.
#e Tomorrow, Kui will be very sick.
#e Tomorrow, Kui will be very sick.
#e Tomorrow, Kui will be sick seriouly.
#e Tanebake have already hit (and) hurt Kui.
#e Tanebake have already hit (and) hurt Kui.
#e Tomorrow, Tanebake will hit (and) hurt Kui
#e Tomorrow, Tanebake will hit (and) hurt Kui
#e (If sick, ) Kui will hate to eat rice.
#e Kui does not want to eat.
#e (After learning to hunt for some time, ) Kui is able to hunt.
#e Kui is able to hunt (long time ago)
#e Next year, Kui will be able to hunt.
#e Next year, Kui will be better at hunting.
#e These students go to the front (and) get hit by the teacher.
#e These student alreay went to the front (and) get hit by the teacher.
#e These student alreay went to the front (and) get hit by the teacher.
#e These student will go to the front (and) get hit by the teacher.
#e Tanebake have already hit (and) hurt Kui.
#n Strangeness resulting from violation of sequential order.
#e Tomorrow, Kui will be very sick.
#e Tanebake have already hit and hurt Kui.
#n 死 --> 打: 可理解，但有點怪怪的。應該是先打再死
#e Tanebake already hit and killed Kui.
#c Tanebake 打 (Kui) 然後(打)死了 Kui
#n Semantic anomaly caused by sequential event violation
#e Tanebake will hit and kill Kui
#n madalame-nga 的 'nga' 沒有加重語調時，為 aspectual marker.
#n 當 madalame-nga 的 'nga' 有加重語調時，表示「強調」，非 aspect marker
#n 錯誤句子。'alupu-nga' 的 'nga' 無法確定被分析為 aspect marker 還是強調，因為兩種分析都不合理。若為
#c 這些學生來 (這裡) 學習
#n 「學習 --> 教」違反 sequential action，所以語意理解上怪怪的。但勉強可理解
#e These students had come here to learn.
#c 這些學生來 (這裡) 學習了
#e These students will come to learn.
#c 這些學生會來 (這裡) 學習
#n mapiya 大家; ’inavayan 好處(你好); inava 好(確定的); nava=lra 幸好
#n harem (現在); =lra PFV對應中文”了2”，final particle, change of state
#e  Saki did not know that Miing and Uyang had gone home.
#c  Saki 不知道 Miing 和 Uyang 都回家了。
#n mu-ruma’ 去-家 (往家裡去); mazalarm 知道; mu 往/變成... (冰棒融化也可以用); mu-’ami 往北邊去; mukuwa- 去.AF (e.g. mukuwa i Taipei 去台北); mu-zekalr 去村莊
#e I heard Sanpuy sang the song he (Sanpuy) liked to Saki.
#c 我聽到 Sanpuy 給 Saki 唱了他(Sanpuy)喜歡的歌。
#n kinger 聽; 這句masenay唱歌可能是在過去唱
#e I heard Sanpuy singing the song Saki liked.
#c 我聽到 Sanpuy 正在唱Saki所喜歡的歌。
#n masasenay = semasenay 都是當下正在唱歌, masasenay比較少講; temakakesi 學生(正在念書);
#e The students in the whole school will go from Zhiben to Taipei by train.
#c 整間學校的學生都要從知本部落坐火車去台北。
#n  kungkuwan(=takesian) 學校; wu-itras (命令你)搭車; kemay 從; mu-itras 上去了; tusiya 汽車; muitras 搭乘; Taihok=Taipak=Taipei; itras 要搭，muitras 是「上去、上樓、搭上」，waitras 是「要搭」，witras 是命令式的「搭」類似建議。
#e I come to Taipei by train.
#e If the chair is broken, have Uyang fix it.
#c 如果椅子壞掉了，就給Uyang 修理。
#n lipad 椅子; muranak 壞; inavaya 還很好
#e Uyang is very good at fixing chairs.
#e Miing is very good at cooking.
#e They see that Saki is going to school.
#c 他們看到 Saki 正準備去學校。
#e They see that Saki is going to school.
#c 他們看到 Saki 正準備去學校。
#n *uri tusasiyaw *uri temusasiyaw; kulang 蔬菜; tamana 高麗菜; tawsay 豆芽菜; saytaw 白蘿蔔(菜頭); ningin 人參
#e Do not let Miing eat the fish she likes to eat.
#c 不要給Miing吃她喜歡(吃)的魚。
#e The person talking to the principal is my mother.
#c 正在跟校長聊天的人是我媽媽。
#n maw 是 ，kimazazayar 商量/聊天/談話; mazayazayar 討論; ma-rengay AF.講話;  ma-<ra>rengay 正在講話
#e Those people talking about the principal are bad people.
#c 那些在談論校長的人是不好的人。
#n kuwatreng 不好; 這句的trau 是head, 那些(~~)的人trau是不好的人
#n para-V 喜歡V; alrupe’ 已經睡覺 (字根);

gloss: 我們.主格=<主事焦點>沾酒用手指彈一彈
free: #e We pentrik first before we eat.
#n pentrik (沾酒點撒(只能是酒)或是抓一點飯和肉敬神明的動作); ekan (吃); a-eken (要吃); ta (我們); ziya (先)
#e Give him lean meat to eat.
#n  isi 肉(沒有油的)可以是豬肉
#n ay ku (給我); maluwa (夠了); ‘alum (肉); isi (瘦肉)
#n varivariw (瘦); ketreve (粗大的，可形容樹或人); senay (歌)
#n kenaw (蔥); ka-sever-an 春天(一定會長芽的那個季節); sever (植物的芽); semasever(正在長新芽)
#e Sanpuy gives Imay money, (and) Imay gives Sanpuy fish.
#c Sanpuy 給 Imay 錢，Imay 給 Sanpuy 魚。
#n veray (給); 第一個tu是Sanpuy,第二個tu是Ima,tu是做那件事情的人
#e He gives her money, (and) she gives him fish.
#n zi (和、然後、又、而); 後面那句才有mu 表示兩個事件的動作有關係

gloss: 他.主格=給-處所焦點=完成
free: #e He has given (it) to her, and she has given (it) to him.
#n 媽媽跟阿姨都在的時候，直接叫某個阿姨
#e Saki and Miing don’t like to eat bamboo shoots.
#n za可以和zi互換(語意指’和’的時候)
#e Saki, Miing, and Uking don’t like bamboo shoots.
#n  papiya可置於tatelu後面 (i Saki za i Miing zi i Uking nazu tatelu papiya ‘azi sahar za selu’); tatelu (三人); za i = zi i (za i 比較常說); nazu tatelu papiya (他們三個都)
#n nu t<em>a<ka>kesi (正在學習); takesi (讀冊)
#n za zuwa 兩個人; zuwa-ya (兩個東西)
#e I like those two wine glasses.
#c 我喜歡那(它們)兩個酒杯
#n kanazu (它們，但可以指人或東西/前面一定會有一個動詞); nazu (他們); na (連接詞); kanizu (一個); kanani (這些)
#c Miing 幫 Sanpuy 煮魚(成菜餚)。

#n * kani Sanpuy tu tusasiyaw-anay i Miing za vulraw (kani 一定要放後面); Miing是主事者，i Miing 移到動詞後面時，為了和 i Sanpuy 區分開， i Sanpuy要改成 kani Sanpuy; tu 和 Miing coindex; Puyuma的OBL和其他語言不一樣的、OBL可能是core; i Sanpuy的i看不出case, 換成kani就很明顯是OBL; siyanaw (煎)
#n = i Miing tu deruwanay (tu sasiyawanay) kani Sanpuy za vulraw
#n = tu deruwanay (tu sasiyawanay) i Miing kani Sanpuy za vulraw

gloss: 他.主格=做成-<重疊>菜-受事焦點
free: #n deruwanay是煮五穀類，不適合用在“煮魚”，應用tusasiyawanay替換
#n =i intawi tui deruwanay kanintaw za vulraw

gloss: 他.主格=做成-<重疊>菜-受事焦點=了
free: #c Miing把魚煮了。(=魚被Miing煮了，翻譯的時候不會這樣翻)
#n tu是Miing; na是nominative marker, za是oblique marker; 本句義同: i Miing tu deruw-aw (tusasiyawaw) lra na vulraw

gloss: 他.主格=做成-<重疊>菜-受事焦點=了
free: #n deru 是水煮 (煮玉米地瓜)

gloss: 他.主格=做成-<重疊>菜-受事焦點
free: #e Miing cook the fish for Sanpuy to eat.
#c Miing 把魚做成菜餚給Sanpuy吃
#e Do not forget to take away your books and pens after class.
#c 下課之後，不要忘記帶走書和筆。
#n 沒有"記得"這種說法; amanan (不要); mada (帶); malalup (忘記); zanu (你的);valray (書); tratruli (筆); katalaulepan (下課、假日); ulep- (累); katalaulepan na wari (假期); maulep (很累)
#e There is no fish in the river.
#n zanum (水); paisu-isu-wa (沒有錢); uniyan (沒有); kana (在)
